text:
Hi,

   Using dynamic_vhost

   like this (line52) VirtualDocumentRoot /var/www/standard/%-2.%-1/%-3+/html

   a website like abc.example.com should go to 
         /var/www/standard/example.com/abc/html FAILS

# /etc/init.d/apache2 start
 * Apache2 has detected a syntax error in your configuration files:
Syntax error on line 52 of /usr/lib/apache2/conf/vhosts/dynamic-vhosts.conf:
syntax error in format string


   The problem is with %-2(DOT)%-1 if I replace it with %-2-%-1 it works
         /var/www/standard/example-com/abc/html 

I believe there is a problem with the Parser for the configuration.

I did see this bug before under 1.3 This is in 2.0.52.
Simillar Bug listed in Bugzilla as #7978

Hope there is a Solution
creator: bguillot@incoretech.com
